original_text: Then say, “That is how Babylon will sink! It will go down and it will never rise up again. The Lord is ready to cause all these terrible troubles to happen to Babylon. Its people will be too weak to stop it.” ’ That is the end of Jeremiah's messages. Then say, “That is how Babylon will sink! It will go down and it will never rise up again. The Lord is ready to cause all these terrible troubles to happen to Babylon. Its people will be too weak to stop it.” ’ That is the end of Jeremiah's messages. The Lord is ready to cause all these terrible troubles to happen to Babylon. Its people will be too weak to stop it.” ’
korean_text: 말하기를 바벨론이 나의 재난 때문에 이같이 몰락하여 다시 일어서지 못하리니 그들이 피폐하리라 하라 하니라 예레미야의 말이 이에 끝나니라

sentences.original_text: That is how Babylon will sink!
and it will never rise up again.
to cause all these terrible troubles
Its people will be too weak
That is the end of Jeremiah's messages.
